resources.string: Add a note to your customer
Enter a detailed item or service description.
Go to your Settings to grant this permission.
We\'re sorry. Your account is currently limited. Please contact us for help.
Your invoice total must be greater than 0
As invoices contain your customers\' personal information, never share an invoice link in a public forum.
Add your mobile contacts to invoice clients more quickly.
You can change this at any time in your account settings.
We\'re sorry, we couldn\'t open the attachment.
You can include a reference, like a purchase order number, here.
Reminder: An invoice payment is due
Draft new invoices and finish them later.
Unpaid invoices will appear here. You can tap on an invoice to edit it or follow up with a customer.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to save that tax. Please try again.
We\'re sorry. We were unable to load your invoices. Please try again.
Invoice date set to \n%1$s.\nTapping Send will deliver the invoice to the customer immediately
